tools.name: Get-UserADDetails
tools.description: Retrieves comprehensive Active Directory details for a user.

Identity.description: User identifier: SAMAccountName, UPN, email address, or display name.

tools.name: Get-UserDevices
tools.description: Retrieves Intune/Entra device information for a user.

Identity.description: User Principal Name (UPN) of the target user.

tools.name: Get-UserEverything
tools.description: Universal user lookup - returns everything about a user from AD, M365, Intune, and sign-in logs.

IncludeSignInHistory.description:
Include sign-in history and risk detections. Off by default because the
audit log queries can be slower and require Entra ID P1/P2.

OutputPath.description:
Optional file path for an HTML dashboard report. Parent directory will be
created if it does not exist.

Identity.description: User identifier: SAMAccountName, UPN, email address, or display name.

tools.name: Get-UserM365Details
tools.description: Retrieves Microsoft 365 details for a user via Microsoft Graph.

Identity.description: User Principal Name (UPN) of the target user.

tools.name: Get-UserSignInHistory
tools.description: Retrieves recent sign-in activity and risk detections for a user.

Identity.description: User Principal Name (UPN) of the target user.

DaysBack.description: Number of days to look back for sign-in history. Default 7, range 1-90.
